con:testCase.name: RR07-RemAmtNotEqualToInstAmt
con:testCase.con:description: TC will create Error Codes for RR07-RemAmtNotEqualToInstAmt

con:property.con:name: expectedStatusReason
con:property.con:value: Sum of all remitted amount must be equal to transaction's amount

con:property.con:name: actualStatusReason
con:property.con:value: Sum of all remitted amount must be equal to transaction's amount

con:config.con:query: SELECT TRANSACTIONSID , ENDTOENDID , PAYMENTTYPE, PAYMENTSTATUS, ISPC , FK_PROCESSINGLINEID FROM TRANSACTIONS WHERE ENDTOENDID LIKE '%${Properties#MsgID}%' and PAYMENTSTATUS = 'REJC'
select * from STATUSREASON where FK_TRANSACTIONID = '${TRANSACTIONS#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/TRANSACTIONSID[1]}' order by CODE desc

select * from STATUSREASON_ADDT_INF where FK_STATUSREASONID in ('${STATUS_REASON#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/STATUSREASONID[1]}','${STATUS_REASON#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[2]/STATUSREASONID[1]}')

con:assertion.name: Sum of all remitted amount must be equal to transaction's amount

con:configuration.token: <ADDITIONALINFORMATION>Sum of all remitted amount must be equal to transaction's amount</ADDITIONALINFORMATION>
